document_data.mainbody:
Rivington was the southern-most district of Baldurs Gate. It was the only region of the Outer City located on the southern shore of the River Chionthar, on the far side of Wyrms Crossing. The Trade Way led south from Rivington to the Lands of Intrigue and Calimshan.
thumb|A map of Rivington and Wyrms Crossing.
The Rivington Rats was a local guild that plagued the neighborhood during the late 15 century DR. Smugglers also frequented the district, running goods by river to Brampton by way of the river.
